t: Amazon hires founders away from AI startup Adept | TechCrunch
s: July 1, 2024 - Amazon has hired away the co-founders of AI agent startup Adept, and entered into a licensing deal with the company for its generative AI tech.

t: r/mlscaling on Reddit: Adept sells out (sorta) to Amazon, citing the barrier of needing "significant attention on fundraising for our foundation models"
s: June 28, 2024 - In addition, the Adept co-founders and some of the team are joining Amazon’s AGI organization to continue to pursue the mission of building useful general intelligence.
